PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: BHJ PSCs with PffBBn : PC71BM active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures showed considerably various photovoltaic performance because of the morphological order change of the blend layer at different processing temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. "PC71BM" - a specific type of active blend layer material
2. "PffBBn" - a specific type of PSC material
3. "different temperatures" - a range of temperatures at which the blend layer was spin-coated
4. "photovoltaic performance" - a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell
5. "morphological order" - a description of the arrangement of the blend layer molecules
6. "processing temperatures" - the temperatures at which the blend layer was processed.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

3. "different temperatures" - a range of temperatures at which the blend layer was spin-coated
4. "photovoltaic performance" - a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell

These entities are relevant to the value of material property because they describe the material properties of the blend layer and the solar cell, and how they are affected by temperature.
